name: cybernetic-website-template
title: Cybernetic Website Template
desc: The project - Cybernetic, features impressive animations and a futuristic slider, making it a standout option.
article:
The project - Cybernetic, features impressive animations and a futuristic slider, making it a standout option. Additionally, the project offers:

  • Astro.build framework
  • React components
  • Sliders
  • Animations
  • Blog with posts
  • product cards / pricing
  • Form & validation
  • Best performance
  • Typescript
  • RWD 


ð ï¸ Easy to customize

All blocks was created with React and Typescript and all functionality is setup by astro.build

This means that even if you dont like astro, you can copy blocks from this project and easly use it with other languages like next.js!


â¨ Stunning Blocks!

Blocks provide a minimalist look, enhancing the overall page aesthetic. Slider parallax looks amazing and work also well!


ð¤ Full support for you!

When you buy any of our themes, you will receive full assistance! (if you need our help on any step)


& many more


Project includes about 12 blocks with a variety of variants and over 10 components providing ample customization options
